data.title: Matt Coles Awarded Killam Teaching Award
data.meta_description: UBC Mathematics Educational Program Director Matt Coles has been awarded a 2023-2024 UBC Killam Teaching Prize. This honour recognizes Dr. Coles' outstanding achievement as a teacher and reflects his enthusiasm for teaching and commitment to his students.
data.text: UBC Mathematics Educational Program Director Matt Coles has been awarded a 2023-2024 UBC Killam Teaching Prize. This honour recognizes Dr. Coles' outstanding achievement as a teacher and reflects his enthusiasm for teaching and commitment to his students.
